Generated Narrative: CodeSystem cs-recommendation-direction

This case-insensitive code system http://fhir.awmf.org/awmf.ig/CodeSystem/cs-recommendation-direction defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
for ForThe recommendation is in favor of the intervention.
against AgainstThe recommendation is against the intervention.

name: RecommendationDirectionCS
title: Recommendation Direction
description: CodeSystem defining the direction of a clinical recommendation.

concept.definition: The recommendation is in favor of the intervention.
The recommendation is against the intervention.
